title: Rough Ball
description: Rough Ball is a multiplayer platform game that tests your skills with its unique bouncy jump mechanic. Master creative moves and cool tricks as you navigate challenging levels designed to keep you on edge. Whether you're a speedrun enthusiast or looking to sharpen your reflexes, Rough Ball offers intense gameplay for all types of players. Compete with friends or join with players worldwide. Collect gold throughout tricky levels and unlock awesome ball skins in the in-game shop to personalize your experience. Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled adventure!
